title: Rooftop coming onto market Treptow
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Stunning 2 bedroom in Treptow on a cul-de-sac, one minute from park and children playground. One full bathroom with tub and shower and guest toilet. Open air kitchen and full size terrace can fit dining table and four chairs or six when squeezing. Elevator opens up to front door. Bike storage and cellar. 
No short term or subletting. You must registered at the address in Germany or moving in the next few months. Proof of income and SCHUFA or FICO required. 
Term starts Sep 1 and is a standard German lease. 

Rent is €2400 kalt plus €400 utilities.
